summary: Personal healthcare website featuring provider profiles (gynecologists, psychologists, nutritionists), online and offline consultations, personalized patient chatbots for tracking care and lifestyle data, and integrated local/online fitness (Zumba/gym) offerings with membership plans and platform fees.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Healthcare + wellness wordmark logo (logo.dim_512x192.png)
- Soft abstract wellness hero illustration with warm, calm tones (hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
- Three category icons set: gynecologist, psychologist, nutritionist in a consistent outline style (category-icons.dim_512x512.png)
- Two fitness icons: zumba and gym in a consistent outline style (fitness-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create the core information architecture and navigation for a personal website that supports three baseline provider categories: gynecologists, psychologists, and nutritionists, with a directory, profile detail pages, and a clear patient flow to connect with a provider.
Add patient authentication using Internet Identity and persist a per-patient profile needed for personalized experiences (e.g., preferences, description/needs, and saved items).

Support online and offline consultations by enabling patients to request, schedule, and view consultation appointments with listed providers, including modality (online/offline), time, status, and notes.

Implement a per-patient “chatbot-style” assistant UI and backend storage that tracks patient-entered items over time: doctor prescriptions, doctor meetings/appointments, doctor records, nutrition surveys, habits, and lifestyle notes; the assistant must be personalized to each patient and continue from prior history.

Add an inbuilt nutrition/food feature that adjusts recommendations based on the patient’s description and needs, using deterministic rules and patient-entered nutrition survey data (no external AI services).

Create a Fitness section that lists online Zumba and online gym options, and also lists offline Zumba/gym options filtered by a patient-provided location input (e.g., city/area/ZIP), without using GPS or map integrations.

Implement membership and pricing configuration for fitness services, supporting platform fee plus day/weekly/monthly/yearly membership options, and display these plans clearly on the Fitness and Pricing pages (no payment processing required).

Introduce a “VIP treatment” tier concept in the UI and data model that can be associated with a patient (e.g., VIP status/benefits label) and shown across the experience while keeping costs/benefits configurable by admins.
Add a minimal admin management area (restricted to an allowlist of admin principals) to manage provider profiles, fitness listings, and membership plan definitions directly in the app.

Apply a cohesive, modern visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) appropriate for a healthcare + wellness platform and enforce it consistently across all pages; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

Add and render required static brand/illustration assets in the frontend (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated) and use them in the layout (e.g., header/hero/category areas) without serving images from the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Doctor profile directory for gynecologists, psychologists, and nutritionists (baseline categories)
Support online and offline consultations between patients and listed doctors
Personalized chatbot per patient to track prescriptions, appointments/meetings, medical records, nutrition surveys, habits, and lifestyle over time
Personalized inbuilt nutrition/food feature that adjusts recommendations based on patient descriptions and needs
List online and nearby offline Zumba and gym options based on patient location
Membership and pricing support for fitness services (platform fee + day/weekly/monthly/yearly membership options)
VIP/low-cost treatment offering concept for patients (preferred experience/pricing tier)

Implement backend data models and APIs to store and retrieve provider profiles for gynecologists, psychologists, and nutritionists, and expose query endpoints for directory listing and profile detail retrieval.

projectName: Healthcare consultation platform with provider profiles, patient tracking assistant, and fitness memberships
